name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - M  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these is a bird?
questions.explanation:
Mac.

	Mac is a red cardinal.  He is all red and has red hair. "Mac tries hard to prove he's the bestSwinging his bat harder than the restBreaking records, enjoying the gameHitting home runs is his claim to fame!"

questions.text: Which of these is a mythological creature?
questions.explanation:
Magic.

	Magic is a white dragon.  Her wings are very shiny, and have many colors on them.  The thread on the wings come in either light or hot pink. "Magic the dragon lives in a dreamThe most beautiful that you have ever seenThrough magic lands she likes to flyLook up and watch her, way up high!"

questions.text: Which of these is a feline?
questions.explanation:
Manes.

	Manes is a lion cub.  He someday wants to be able to roar very loud, but he can only mew. "As the king of jungle lore I'll let out a mighty ROARBut now the best that I can doSounds much more like a playful MEW!"

questions.text: Which of these might be killed by boat propellers as an animal in the wild?
questions.explanation:
Manny.

	Manny is a manatee.  Manatees die by boat propellers in Florida waters.  Florida even has a Save the Manatees foundation. "Manny is sometimes called a sea cowShe likes to twirl and likes to bowManny sure is glad you bought herBecause it's so lonely under water!"

questions.text: Which of these dogs is also the name of a television show from the 80s and 90s?
questions.explanation:
Matlock.

	Matlock the dog is white on one half, and gray on the other.  He lies down like Banjo and Cutesy. "Please let me out into the yardI promise that I will stand guardI'll take good care of you; you'll seeIt's part of being a family!"

questions.text: Which of these will you most likely find on a farm?
questions.explanation:
Meekins.

	Mel is a koala, and Merlion and Merriment are both bears.  Meekins is a lamb.  She sits like Ewey and has very soft and furry fabric. "Lambs are gentle and lambs are kindThe sweetest animals you will findLambs are meek and lambs are shyBut they still take time to say, "HI"!"

questions.text: Which of these Beanie Babies is known as a flat Beanie Baby?
questions.explanation:
Mel.

	Mel is a koala.  Koalas live in Australia and only eat eucalyptus leaves.  He has a very big nose. "How do you name a koala bear?It's rather tough, I do declare!It confuses me, I get into a funkI'll name him Mel after my favorite hunk!"

questions.text: Which of these is a rabbit?
questions.explanation:
Minksy.

	Minksy is an orange bunny with really long ears.  She is related to Binksy and Winksy. "Hopping down the bunny trailWith my little cotton tailWinksy and Binksy by my sideKeep up with me! Don't break your stride!"

questions.text: Which of these bears does not sit like the other choices?
questions.explanation:
Monarch.

	Mother, Mistletoe, and Minnesota all sit like most Beanie Baby bears.  Monarch, however, is a grizzly bear that sits like Aurora.  He has very curly hair.  He is a San Francisco Zoo exclusive, because Monarch was the first grizzly at the zoo. "Through the kindness of Mr. Hearst The Monarch grizzly was the firstAnd on our flag, so proud and trueFirst at the San Francisco Zoo!"

questions.text: Which of these is a monkey?
questions.explanation:
Mooch.

	Mooch is a Colombo monkey.  These monkeys are mostly black with a tan face, hands, and feet.  He also has white hair around his face. "Look in the treetops, up towards the skySwinging from branches way up highTempt him with a banana or fruitWhen he's hungry, he acts so cute!"
